name: A CITY VIEW THROUGH CITY EYES.
description: MUMBAI the city which never sleeps. Let's see MUMBAI in all aspect from the local markets to the best Hotels. Mumbai has it all, we can roam in the city in private car or local transport and have local food. Visit to all the places which has made what Mumbai is today. Mumbai has one of the best nightlife in the world. Beaches, Bollywood, Rains, Shopping, Festivals, etc are things which are integral part of the city. We together will design our trip and make the most of your visit.
